title: Absolution
description: Elizabeth Lancaster is settling down in her domestic life as a wife and mother. With Cain by her side, Lizzie attempts to put the previous year behind her. But the darkness won’t let her rest. It constantly reminds her that change is coming. Still she he finds solace in her human world and her new life, unaware of the powder keg she, her family, and friends are sitting on. Although Lizzie tries not to see or believe the growing number of unexplainable events that occur around her, she cannot deny that supernatural occurrences riddle her world. Her suspicions are verified when she and her father have a rare heart-to-heart talk, and she receives the confirmation she has known all along—that she is different. Her father tells her to follow her instincts and not to be afraid of what she cannot explain. Lizzie’s human world is beginning to merge with the Night World. The time has come for the Plan to begin and The Three Crowns to start coming together. But many obstacles still remain for Cain, Rob, and Lizzie. The Ancients will step in and force the Plan, turning everyone’s world upside down and threatening the future of The Three Crowns.
author: Sonya Ray
